article:
It's Sunday afternoon. Mary and her mother go to the store. Her mother wants to buy some food. Mary wants to buy a skirt and some school things. They come to a store.
"What do you sell?" Mary asks.
"Many things." the girl says. "You can buy food, drinks, clothes and school things.
Mary wants a skirt.
" What color do you want?" asks the girl.
"White. "
"Have a look _ this one. It's nice."
"How much is the skirt?"
" _ eighty yuan."
"Can I find a cheap one?"
"What about the green one? It _ nice. And it is _ thirty yuan."
"OK. Thanks ."
"You are welcome."
After that, Mary buys some school things, too. _ mother buys some food, like bread, meat and chicken. They get home very late.
